title: Design Thinking-Based Blended Learning Program for Enhancing IMT Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and workplace problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-optimized content design for working professionals in science fields, featuring practical task-centered modules applicable to real-world work settings

learning_goals: Learners will enhance their ability to solve science-related work problems using the 5-stage design thinking process (Empathize-Define-Ideate-Prototype-Test).
Learners will master IMT skills to collect, analyze, and visualize information using smartphone-based digital tools.
Learners will cultivate the ability to develop and execute self-directed learning plans in blended learning environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
